review: a beautiful story of a bond between a son and his father who's willing to go to any lengths to fulfil his son's dream of playing at lords. sharman joshi has played his part of the father to absolute perfection. to this date, it remains one of my favourite hindi movies which i can watch anytime, not just because it's a good story but because its a story that most of us can relate to. all in all, a really good movie which isn't appreciated enough.
